thread.section_title: The Inn At The Spanish Steps - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel and staff
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel and staff - Review of The Inn At The Spanish Steps, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: DW11LOw
title: Wonderful hotel and staff
text: We came to Rome for a short break and chose the inn at the Spanish steps as our place to stay. Upon arrival we were advised we had been upgraded (always nice news) to an executive room! This room was wonderfully appointed with all mod cons and a bed to die for after a long day of seeing the wonderful sights of Rome. There was a private butler breakfast (for the 6 executive rooms, that served anything we wanted and they remember preferences which is always a great touch. The concierge were fantastic and so knowledgeable which added to an overall fantastic experience! This is the only place to stay from now on; unique, special and amazing!
